featured.text: This probably explains why during the COVID-19 pandemic, horror and pandemic thrillers were the most-watched movies on digital movie apps.

definition.zh_def: 解釋；說明某事的意義或原因。
definition.en_def: To make something clear or easy to understand by describing it in detail.
definition.example: Can you explain how this machine works?
